siteMetadata.name: Patrick Jose
siteMetadata.title: Patrick Jose
siteMetadata.description: Software Engineer | Real-time Systems | Full-stack developer
siteMetadata.about: As a professional software engineer with over 5 years of experience, I have a strong foundation in developing real-time software systems.             My expertise spans a range of programming languages and tools, including C++, Python, Java, and JavaScript, as well as cloud platforms like             Google Cloud and AWS. I also have experience in other areas, including developing AI models, designing and implementing distributed systems,             and creating web applications.
